name: Hymn of Peace
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Champions of Purity © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: Each time a subject of this spell attempts to attack another creature or object, or otherwise perform an aggressive or damaging action toward a creature or object, it must attempt a Will save. If the save succeeds, the subject can attack normally. If the save fails, the subject cannot follow through with the attack and loses that part of its action. Creatures not taking violent actions are unaffected by this spell.
area_zh: 以自身为中心的40呎爆发
text_zh: 被影响生物每次尝试攻击其他生物或物品，或对生物和物品进行侵略性行为和伤害性行为时都必须通过一个意志鉴定。如果成功就照常攻击，如果失败就失去该动作。不进行暴力动作的生物不受影响。
